entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
